name: Golden Browns - 18 Inch Square Pillow Cover In Silk Taffeta with Leather Flowers
description:
Pillow Cover (Without Filler) On Chocolate Brown Color Silk Taffeta adorned with Gold Art Leather Flowers. Each Flower has a semiprecious diamante in the center. A contemporary contrast of brown and gold to adorn your homes.

Hand Crafted in Square shape in size - 18 inches x 18 inches.

The back of the pillow is in satin fabric with a concealed zipper for a clean look and easy removal.
